body.name: HOOBRO Side Table, 3-Tier Narrow End Table, Nightstand with 2 Flat or Slant Adjustable Shelves for Small Spaces, Hallway, Living Room, Bedroom, Sturdy, Easy Assembly, Rustic Brown and Black BF23BZ01G1
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 9 hrs 58 mins
features: Charming Appearance: End table with the vintage wood tones tabletop combines with matte black powder-coated metal frames, together with the trendy mesh element, it exudes the charm of elegance and warmth, adds unique personality and Artistic beauty for your home

Large Size: Dimensions of 23.6"L x 11.8"W x 23.6"H. This charming tall side table fits in home or office, next to sofa or bed, as functional nightstands or collection shelves.Take advantage of its large capacity to keep work or study away from chaos

Multifunctional: Max Static Load Capacity of Tabletop: 66 lb. This side table could be used as an end table, 3 tier open shelves provides sufficient room for your decorations. This narrow end table can be used as an end table, a nightstand, a side table, a snack table. The skinny table works perfectly in small spaces

Pleasure of Diy: You may find the bottom mesh shelf is adjustable and you can attach either flat or slightly slanted. In addition to storing items, the rising edges also can protect your items from falling down to the floor

Easy-Peasy Assembly: Crafted of quality MDF and heavy metal frame, the bedside table is durable and more stable. We’ve simplified every assembly step, you’ll finish the job in no time if you follow the detailed instructions in the package

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little piece
reviews.reviewText: The pictures don't do this table justice. This is a really beautiful piece. It was a snap to assemble, even for someone like me who usually has trouble with these things. It only took me about 15 minutes from emptying the box to a finished table. The instructions consist of only three simple steps. It was the perfect size for my new Denon stereo, and I plan on using the shelves for CD storage. It is very well built and sturdy, and there is no chance of it toppling or collapsing. It fit perfectly in the space I had for it in my living room, and it matches the other dark wood furniture I have. Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little table for the price
reviews.reviewText: This little table was exactly what I needed: a short, compact table to use as TV stand (24" tv). I was pleased with the quality; very sturdy with two shelves. It has an "industrial" look, but doesn't look cheap. Very easy to assemble, just make sure the holes on the side piece are lined up the same. Definitely recommend it for the quality. Well packaged too, not a single mark on the top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as Advertised!
reviews.reviewText: Shelf is perfect! Love the ease of putting it together and for such a small shelf it's very sturdy. Really like the look of it and it's modern design. Received very quickly and extremely happy with this product. Everything is labeled, no additional tools necessary and very, very sturdy. Thanks so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for What It Is
reviews.reviewText: LIKE:The product came very well packed, so no damage and no hassle.The look of the table is not an eyesore. For $49.00, I am thankful. Perfect for 6 pairs of work boots.The spacing between shelves is just high enough for ankle-high boots.Sturdy enough to handle the weight of 6 pairs of heavy boots.Like the leveling feet.The shipping box was shockingly small. That is likely a good thing, environmentally speaking.NEUTRAL:Is this a gorgeous table? NO. It is okay. It is also NOT expensive.It doesn't show well in the photos, but all black metal bars come in two pieces. They fit in such a way that the piece remains strong.Assembly was not too hard.The quality is good enough for the piece to function.For the price, it is good enough. I think it could be priced lower and still be a profitable item for the seller. Nonetheless, it is not an expensive table, it DOES do its job, and it is not fair to gripe about it much if you paid $50.00 for it.DO NOT LIKE:The table top comes in two pieces too. It is clear in the photos, so it is not a surprise, but I wish that it was in one piece.Also, I wish that the metal bars were in one piece (for each run).The directions are helpful but lacking. You need to figure it out.Overall, it is not an heirloom, but it will work in situation of necessity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well built for price point
reviews.reviewText: While this seems like it could be built cheaply I was surprised to see it had decent quality for the price range. So much so I bought another. Easy to put together too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchase so much on Amazon and like other products the quality is wonderful and the price was so reasonable would highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This nightstand is perfect for my little nook. I love how easy it was to put together and how much space there is to store shoes, books, and my lava lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap but did the job intended
reviews.reviewText: It’s a cheap little table. It wobbles a bit. It’s decent looking but made out of cheap material that chips during assembly. Assembly was pretty straightforward and not complicated, which is a plus. I am giving it 3 stars because I needed a small table like this to house my two aerogardens and it definitely delivered in terms of space and aesthetics. It is a very small table though. More ideal for a small college apartment or for decorative use.

The only issue I had was with the inserts for the feet. The plastic inserts did not seem to be firm in the steel legs but time will tell. Other than that it was easy to assemble and the measurements were exact.
